data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Prema, M., Ravichandran, S., Ng, Peter K. L. (2018): Redescription of Parilia alcocki Wood-Mason, in Wood-Mason & Alcock, 1891 (Decapoda, Brachyura, Leucosiidae) from southeast India. Zootaxa 4378 (1): 111-120, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4378.1.7|2 occurrences
